summary: Comprehensive validation testing completed for Bee It Feedback after Radix UI update. PRIMARY OBJECTIVE ACHIEVED: NO removeChild errors detected in browser console. All 41 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing confirms all core features working: login for all 3 roles (Admin, Gestor, Colaborador), role-based dashboards, navigation, CRUD operations, dropdowns, modals, selects, and toasts.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown menus sometimes stay open and intercept clicks on other elements
ui_bugs.details: When navigating between pages, dropdown menus (notifications, user menu) may remain open and block clicks on buttons like 'Novo Usuário'. Workaround: Press Escape or click elsewhere to close dropdowns before clicking other elements.

critical_code_review_comments: Radix UI update successfully resolved removeChild errors - no console errors detected during extensive dropdown/modal testing
Toast system using native DOM is working correctly
React useEffect dependency warnings still present in some pages (non-critical)
seed_data_creation: Seed data already present with 12 users, 9 teams, 7 feedbacks, 5 action plans
context_for_next_testing_agent: Radix UI update validated - NO removeChild errors. All features working. Backend tests updated with correct credentials and BASE_URL. Minor dropdown overlay issue exists but does not affect functionality.

backend: User CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Team CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Feedback CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Action Plan CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Action Plan Items CRUD (create, list, update/toggle)
Notifications list and mark all read
frontend: Login page loads with Bee It branding
Admin login and dashboard (12 users, 9 teams, 7 feedbacks, 5 plans)
Gestor login and dashboard with alerts and recent feedbacks
Colaborador login and dashboard with personal metrics
Role-based sidebar navigation (Usuários/Times hidden for non-admin)
New User modal with form fields and role select
Action Plans page with progress bars
Action Plan detail with items and check-ins
Collaborator profile with timeline and recurring points

removeChild_error_verification.details: Extensive testing performed with rapid dropdown open/close cycles, modal interactions, and navigation. NO removeChild errors detected in browser console.
tests_performed: User menu dropdown - 5 rapid open/close cycles
Check-in modal on Action Plan detail

visual_verification.glassmorphism_cards: Working on dashboard and detail pages
visual_verification.progress_bars: Working on action plans (40% shown correctly)
